about_the_game:
Carl Hart, a mild-mannered alcoholic handyman, finds himself trapped in a time loop after finding his dear daughter murdered. Trapped within his house and stalked by a mysterious figure, Carl is in a race to find a way out of the loop or die over and over to a scandalous police officer. With enough evidence gathered, he might just avenge his daughter and go free, or he might just go mad.

Sneak through your house and dodge your stalker's rage.


Find secrets hidden throughout the house by your dearly departed family

Survive alone as your own house becomes your worst nightmare

Document evidence through time to save yourself from a cruel fate

Master your memory to solve over 20 puzzle variationsSolve the Murder of your beloved daughter.

content_descriptors.notes: Memento is a 2D, Thriller, Puzzle game, where players solve the mystery of their daughters death. Players interacting with others within the house will turn out negative, leading to bloodshed. Player deaths are frequent and violent. Players will also be subject to hints of alcohol abuse by the protagonist.

short_description: Your home has been turned upside down. Your daughter lies dead, and the police blame you. In a strange twist of fate, you’re caught in a time loop where you get out of bed, only to be gunned down moments later. Can you prove your innocence? Can you find the killer? Can you escape with your life?
